trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown for errors in an arithmetic, casting, or conversion operation.
<xref:System.ArithmeticException> is the base class for the following exceptions:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArithmeticException> 是以下异常的基类：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DivideByZeroException>, which is thrown in integer division when the divisor is 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DivideByZeroException>这整数除法引发除数为 0 时。

trans-unit.source: For example, attempting to divide 10 by 0 throws a <xref:System.DivideByZeroException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，尝试除 10 由 0 引发<xref:System.DivideByZeroException>异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.NotFiniteNumberException>, which is thrown when an operation is performed on or returns <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Single.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Single.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Single.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the programming language used does not support those values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NotFiniteNumberException>其中一个操作上执行或返回时引发<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Single.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Single.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Single.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType>，并使用的编程语言不支持这些值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.OverflowException>, which is thrown when the result of an operation is outside the bounds of the target data type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.OverflowException>其中的目标数据类型边界之外的操作的结果时引发。

trans-unit.source: That is, it is less than a number's `MinValue` property or greater than its `MaxValue` property.
trans-unit.target: 它也是一个数字小于`MinValue`属性或大于其`MaxValue`属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, attempting to assign 200 + 200 to a <xref:System.Byte> value throws an <xref:System.OverflowException> exception, since 400 greater than 256, the upper bound of the <xref:System.Byte> data type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，尝试分配到 200 + 200<xref:System.Byte>值都将引发<xref:System.OverflowException>异常，因为 400 大于 256，上限<xref:System.Byte>数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Your code should not handle or throw this exception.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码不应处理或引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should either handle or throw one of its derived classes, since it more precisely indicates the exact nature of the error.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你应处理或引发一个及其派生类中，由于更确切地说，它指示错误的真正性质。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ArithmeticException>, see the <xref:System.ArithmeticException> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.ArithmeticException>，请参阅<xref:System.ArithmeticException>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ArithmeticException> uses the HRESULT COR_E_ARITHMETIC, which has the value 0x80070216.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArithmeticException> 使用 HRESULT COR_E_ARITHMETIC，其值 0x80070216。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArithmeticException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArithmeticException" /> class.

This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The arithmetic operation is not allowed."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"算术运算不允许。"的新实例的属性

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ArithmeticException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.ArithmeticException>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: `null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArithmeticException" /> class with a specified error message.
The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ArithmeticException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.ArithmeticException>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArithmeticException" /> class with serialized data.
This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ArithmeticException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `Nothing` 属性不向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>）。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ArithmeticException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的实例的初始属性值<xref:System.ArithmeticException>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 属性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
